channel.title: Translation on Steam Translation Server
channel.description:
Hi,
I saw that you use [url]https://bmtranslate.darkbb.com/[/url] for translating the game into other languages.
Now the question: Why not use the Steam Translation Server from Valve?

item.title: Translation on Steam Translation Server
item.dc:creator: Morgenstern
item.description:
I created an account on the “darkbb” forum a week ago and it was not activated by anyone.

This thread is also created a week ago and nobody answered. Is it that hard to give a simple answer?

I want to help translate the game into romanian but I can’t do it without your help first.

Read full topic
